summary: Retrieve OHLCV data corresponding to a baseToken and a quoteToken
description: Return all ticks in an array

parameters.name: pairName
parameters.description: the pair name under the format {baseTokenSymbol}/{quoteTokenSymbol}(eg. "ZRX/WETH"). I believe this parameter is currently required but it's planned to be optional. The idea is for this parameter to be used for verifications purposes and the API to send back an eror if it does not correspond to a baseToken/quoteToken parameters

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: unit used to represent the above duration: "min", "hour", "day", "week", "month", "year"

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: duration (in units, see param below) of each candlestick

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: the beginning timestamp (number of seconds from 1970/01/01) from which ohlcv data has to be queried

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: the ending timestamp ((number of seconds from 1970/01/01)) until which ohlcv data has to be queried
